Monitoring application

This section details ways to automate measurement acquisition in order to set up the OhmPi as a monitoring tool.

Repeated acquisition at fixed intervals

The easiest way to set up time-lapse acquisition is to perform repeated acquisition of a sequence at fixed intervals. Repeated acquisition can be initiated from the three different `interfaces`_.
